subject: [Lab 04] Q3: GCD
content:
Q3: GCD

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q3: GCD in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: Are we allowed to use lists?

follow-ups.feedback: If you use recursion properly (which is required), lists will not be necessary

threads.question: I'm confused as to how to even start to address the problem. Can I get some hints please?

follow-ups.feedback: The problem description basically describes exactly what you have to do. As a starting point, try finding the smaller and larger of `a` and `b`, and go from there.

threads.question: When I test out the cases in python, my code seems to work but when I put it through the ok test, there seems to be a bug. I don't know what's wrong...  ![](/redirect/s3?bucket=uploads&prefix=attach%2Fjziyku5gomy7aq%2Fjlx2xhbqzpklj%2Fk1363oqfu7zy%2Flab04_error_2.PNG)  ![](/redirect/s3?bucket=uploads&prefix=attach%2Fjziyku5gomy7aq%2Fjlx2xhbqzpklj%2Fk13677syb6k4%2Flab_04_correct.PNG)

follow-ups.feedback: You prolly accidentally modified one of the doctests; compare with the original file re-extracted from the original zip
